title: Schenley High School basketball team and coaches, in blazers with state championship patch, including from left: Rodrick Horne, Ricky Harper, Charles Burley, Jacob Williams, Assistant Coach Robert Wippenbach, Montel Brundage, Coach Williard Fisher, Marvin Snowden, Jimmy Prince, unknown, Kenny Durrett, and K.
